* The BruException class is an exception that is specific to the chatbot.
* Any subexceptions must override the getDisplayMessage() method which
* determines the error message displayed to the user.
public abstract class BruException extends RuntimeException {
* The EmptyParmsException class represents an exceptional event
* where the user supplied no parameters while at least one parameter
return String.format("Bruh... the description of %s cannot be empty.", subject);
* The FileCorruptException class represents an exceptional event
* where the save file for tasks is not in a format that is readable,
return String.format("Bruh... the saved task list was corrupted.");
* The InvalidDateException class represents an exceptional event
* where user supplied dates are invalid and cannot be parsed.
return String.format("Bruh... the date(s) of %s is invalid", subject);
* The InvalidParmsException class represents an exceptional event
* where the user supplied parameters to a command in an invalid format.
return String.format("Bruh... the description of %s is invalid.", subject);
* The TaskNotFoundException class represents an exceptional event
* where a task to be marked/unmarked/deleted was not found in the task list.
return String.format("Bruh... the task to %s could not be found.", subject);
* The UnknownCommandException class represents an exceptional event
* where the command, that is, the first parameter supplied by the user,
* is not recognised by the chatbot.
return "Bruh... I don't know what you mean.";
* The DeadlineTask class represents a task that must be completed by a given date/time.
* Instantiates a task with a deadline.
* @param message  The contents of the task.
* @param isDone   Whether the task is completed or not.
* @param deadline The deadline to complete the task by.
public DeadlineTask(String message, boolean isDone, LocalDate deadline) {
return new String[]{"D", this.isDone ? "1" : "0", this.message, this.deadline.toString(), ""};
* The EventTask class represents a task that starts and ends at some given dates/times.

* @param isDone  Whether the task was completed or not.

public EventTask(String message, LocalDate start, LocalDate end) {
